typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ACOACOID as string,
		ACOAGAID as string,
		ACOLN2 as decimal(38,18),
		ACOINSURER as decimal(38,18),
		ACOCOSHARE as decimal(38,18),
		ACOBROKER as decimal(38,18),
		ACOBROKSW as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
